Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI did not provide consistent feedback to improve my learning, whereas I found that my teacher gave more productive and unique feedback that GenAI did not pick up on.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback from my teacher made me feel more motivated, rather than the feedback from my GenAI because I did not know how reliable the feedback would be.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI gave inconsistent feedback. Sometimes, it would tell me that my work is perfectly written and when I would point errors in my work, then it would tell me that I needed significant improvements in my writing.
